Name: RRR (Hindi)
Description: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.

Name: Breaded Life
Description: After everyone in his life mysteriously forgets him, a wealthy young man must seek help from the only one who recognizes him — the local bread seller.

Name: Interceptor
Description: The last officer standing on a remote missile defense base wages the battle of her life against terrorists aiming 16 stolen nuclear weapons at the US.

Name: Hustle
Description: When a down-on-his-luck basketball scout finds a potential superstar in Spain, he sets out to prove they both have what it takes to make it in the NBA.

Name: Ayinla
Description: This musical film follows the life of popular Yoruba Apala musician Ayinla Omuwura, from his rise to fame and relationships to his untimely death.

Name: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
Description: Members of an elite security team battle to save the lives of trapped U.S. Consulate personnel under attack by armed terrorists in Benghazi, Libya.

Name: Beast
Description: A jaded former intelligence agent is pulled back into action when an attack at a mall creates a tense hostage situation.

Name: The Adam Project
Description: After accidentally crash-landing in 2022, time-traveling fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self on a mission to save the future.

Name: Omo Ghetto: the Saga
Description: Twins are reunited as a good-hearted female gangster and her uptight rich sister take on family, crime, cops and all of the trouble that follows them.

Name: Baywatch
Description: To save their beach, elite lifeguard Mitch Buchannon and a former Olympian probe a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

Name: Red Notice
Description: An FBI profiler pursuing the world's most wanted art thief becomes his reluctant partner in crime to catch an elusive crook who's always one step ahead.

Name: Gangubai Kathiawadi
Description: Duped and sold to a brothel, a young woman fearlessly reclaims her power, using underworld connections to preside over the world she was once a pawn in.

Name: Man of God
Description: Samuel forsakes his harsh religious upbringing to live his own life — but his soul remains caught between the world and the faith he left behind.

Name: Kambili: The Whole 30 Yards
Description: Determined to marry before she turns 30, a woman tries to change her impulsive ways and do whatever it takes to win back the boyfriend who left her.

Name: Through My Window
Description: Raquel's longtime crush on her next-door neighbor turns into something more when he starts developing feelings for her, despite his family's objections.

Name: RattleSnake - The Ahanna Story
Description: In this stylish remake, a disillusioned mastermind assembles a team to pull off a series of spectacular heists — but his crimes make too many enemies.

Name: 365 Days: This Day
Description: Laura and Massimo are back and stronger than ever. But Massimo's family ties and a mysterious man bidding for Laura’s heart complicate the lovers' lives.

Name: Blue Story
Description: A gang war dooms the lifelong bond of south London friends in this acclaimed crime drama that features its writer-director as a rapping Greek chorus.

Name: Amina
Description: In 16th-century Zazzau, now Zaria, Nigeria, Amina must utilize her military skills and tactics to defend her family's kingdom. Based on a true story.

Name: Senior Year
Description: A cheerleading stunt gone wrong landed her in a 20-year coma. Now she's 37, newly awake and ready to live out her high school dream: becoming prom queen.

Name: Silverton Siege
Description: After a failed sabotage mission, a trio of anti-apartheid freedom fighters ends up in a tense bank hostage situation. Based on a true story.

Name: Extraction
Description: A hardened mercenary's mission becomes a soul-searching race to survive when he's sent into Bangladesh to rescue a drug lord's kidnapped son.

Name: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion (Hindi Version)
Description: To avenge his father's death, a young man leads an army into battle against a cruel tyrant in this Hindi conclusion to the historic saga.

Name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Description: Peter Parker returns to routine life as a high schooler until the Vulture's arrival gives him the chance to prove himself as a web-slinging superhero.

Name: Central Intelligence
Description: A CIA operative contacts a former high school buddy with accounting chops to help dissolve a lethal plot against U.S. undercover agents.

Name: The Accountant
Description: Not only is this accountant able to dig deeply into a company's books, he's also an expert assassin, and his new client can use both skills.

Name: Sooryavanshi
Description: A fearless, faithful (and only slightly forgetful) Mumbai cop pulls out all the stops — and stunts — to thwart a major conspiracy to attack his city.

Name: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
Description: When he learns that his friend has been accused of murder, Jack Reacher suspects a vast conspiracy -- and soon finds himself on the run alongside her.

Name: Double World
Description: Keen to bring honor to his clan, young villager Dong Yilong embarks on a perilous journey to compete in a tournament that selects warriors for battle.

Name: The Amazing Spider-Man
Description: In this reboot of the hit superhero franchise, high schooler Peter Parker learns to wield his newfound powers while facing down arch-villain The Lizard.

Name: Army of Thieves
Description: In this prequel to "Army of the Dead," a mysterious woman recruits bank teller Dieter to help her crew crack three legendary safes across Europe.

Name: Man of Steel
Description: Drifter Clark Kent must keep his powers hidden from the world, but when an evil general plans to destroy Earth, the Man of Steel springs into action.

Name: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
Description: Four high school students get sucked into the jungle setting of a video game, where they embark on a quest as their comically mismatched adult avatars.

Name: Jumanji: The Next Level
Description: When Spencer goes missing, Martha, Bethany and Fridge realize they must go back into Jumanji to find him — but something goes wrong.

Name: The Tourist
Description: An American tourist seeking solace for his shattered heart instead finds it in danger again after encountering a beautiful Interpol agent.

Name: The Last Airbender
Description: In a world ravaged by the Fire nation's aggression toward the peaceful Air, Water and Earth nations, a young boy holds the key to restoring peace.

Name: Kate
Description: Slipped a fatal poison on her final job, a ruthless assassin working in Tokyo has less than 24 hours to find out who ordered the hit and exact revenge.

Name: The Tuxedo
Description: After a government spy is hospitalized, New York City cab driver Jimmy unwillingly takes over the spy's role -- with the aid of a computerized tuxedo.

Name: 6 Underground
Description: After faking his death, a tech billionaire recruits a team of international operatives for a bold and bloody mission to take down a brutal dictator.

Name: Green Snake
Description: While trying to free her sister from Fahai's clutches, Xiao Qing winds up in a dystopian city and meets a mysterious man who can't recall his past life.

Name: Close
Description: When attackers target the heiress she's protecting, battle-hardened bodyguard Sam scrambles to save her client -- and teach her how to fight back.

Name: Escape Room: Tournament Of Champions
Description: It's game on, again. Two survived the nightmarish maze of escape rooms, but this time, the puzzle maker has grander, more diabolical plans in store.

Name: Monster Hunter
Description: A sandstorm transports Captain Artemis and her unit to a hostile new world, where they discover enormous monsters that are immune to their firepower.

Name: In Time
Description: In a near future where no one ages and time is the new currency, a man becomes a suspect when he inherits decades from a wealthy murder victim.

Name: Transformers: The Last Knight
Description: After Optimus Prime takes a dark turn, Cade Yeager joins forces with a group of Autobots to stop a villainous plot to destroy Earth.

Name: Man on Fire
Description: A jaded ex-CIA operative reluctantly accepts a job as the bodyguard for a 10-year-old girl in Mexico City and will stop at nothing when she's kidnapped.

Name: Saaho
Description: In a fictional megalopolis, a stunning underworld theft triggers a fierce power struggle among the gangsters, with an enigmatic cop on their trail.

Name: Ben & Jody
Description: Two best friends band together with a group of villagers to fight back against treacherous illegal loggers attempting to take away their land.

Name: Ip Man 4: The Finale
Description: Ip Man travels to San Francisco with his son and wrestles with tensions between martial arts masters and his star student, Bruce Lee.

Name: Pompeii
Description: In the days leading up to the eruption of Mount Vesuvius, a slave being sent to Naples is determined to get back home to save the woman he loves.

Name: Shaft
Description: When the son he doesn't know comes to him for help, badass private eye John Shaft discovers his offspring is anything but a chip off the old block.

Name: White House Down
Description: When a paramilitary group engineers a violent takeover of the White House, the president must try to hide from the attackers until he can be rescued.

Name: Mohenjo Daro
Description: A courageous villager moves to the ancient city of Mohenjo Daro, where he falls for the daughter of a priest and does battle with a tyrant.

Name: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
Description: In this action-packed sequel to G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra, the elite anti-terrorist team finds itself framed for treason by global mercenary Zartan.

Name: Kong: Skull Island
Description: A U.S. military and scientific team sets out to survey an uncharted remote island, unaware of the gigantic surprise that lies in wait for them.

Name: Breaded Life
Description: After everyone in his life mysteriously forgets him, a wealthy young man must seek help from the only one who recognizes him — the local bread seller.

Name: Hustle
Description: When a down-on-his-luck basketball scout finds a potential superstar in Spain, he sets out to prove they both have what it takes to make it in the NBA.

Name: Interceptor
Description: The last officer standing on a remote missile defense base wages the battle of her life against terrorists aiming 16 stolen nuclear weapons at the US.

Name: RRR (Hindi)
Description: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.

Name: Ayinla
Description: This musical film follows the life of popular Yoruba Apala musician Ayinla Omuwura, from his rise to fame and relationships to his untimely death.

Name: Omo Ghetto: the Saga
Description: Twins are reunited as a good-hearted female gangster and her uptight rich sister take on family, crime, cops and all of the trouble that follows them.

Name: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
Description: Members of an elite security team battle to save the lives of trapped U.S. Consulate personnel under attack by armed terrorists in Benghazi, Libya.

Name: The Amazing Spider-Man
Description: In this reboot of the hit superhero franchise, high schooler Peter Parker learns to wield his newfound powers while facing down arch-villain The Lizard.

Name: Fate of Alakada
Description: Faking her way through any situation, a social media influencer poses as an event planner and is tasked with throwing an extravagant, star-studded bash.

Name: King of Boys
Description: When a powerful businesswoman’s political ambitions are threatened by her underworld connections, the ensuing power struggle could cost her everything.

Name: Chief Daddy 2 - Going for Broke
Description: The Beecroft family are ready to spend all of Chief Daddy's inheritance, but not if the CEO of his company has anything to do with it.

Name: Hire a Woman
Description: An uptight man attempts to make his ex-girlfriend jealous when he pays his co-worker to act as his lover at a university reunion.

Name: The Last Airbender
Description: In a world ravaged by the Fire nation's aggression toward the peaceful Air, Water and Earth nations, a young boy holds the key to restoring peace.

Name: Òlòtūré
Description: In Lagos, a journalist goes undercover as a prostitute to expose human trafficking. What she finds is a world of exploited women and ruthless violence.

Name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Description: Peter Parker returns to routine life as a high schooler until the Vulture's arrival gives him the chance to prove himself as a web-slinging superhero.

Name: Fifty Shades of Grey
Description: A wealthy, older man and a naïve college student engage in an intense relationship marked by the exploration of erotic extremes.

Name: 365 Days
Description: A woman falls victim to a dominant mafia boss, who imprisons her and gives her one year to fall in love with him.

Name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
Description: John and Jane are an average-on-the-surface couple who don't yet know that they share the same undercover line of work: They're both guns for hire.

Name: A Madea Homecoming
Description: Madea's back — hallelujer! And she's not putting up with any nonsense as family drama erupts at her great-grandson's college graduation celebration.

Name: Me Before You
Description: Vivacious, unassuming Lou faces pointed questions of the heart when she takes a job caring for a wealthy, cynical bachelor paralyzed in an accident.

Name: Army of Thieves
Description: In this prequel to "Army of the Dead," a mysterious woman recruits bank teller Dieter to help her crew crack three legendary safes across Europe.

Name: 6 Underground
Description: After faking his death, a tech billionaire recruits a team of international operatives for a bold and bloody mission to take down a brutal dictator.

Name: Central Intelligence
Description: A CIA operative contacts a former high school buddy with accounting chops to help dissolve a lethal plot against U.S. undercover agents.

Name: Don't Breathe
Description: He's blind and rich -- the perfect target for robbery. But the tables turn when three teen thieves find themselves in a lethal game of cat and mouse.

Name: Friends with Benefits
Description: When a recruiter and an art director strike up a friendship, they decide to capitalize on their chemistry with casual sex and no emotional attachments.

Name: The Tinder Swindler
Description: Posing as a wealthy, jet-setting diamond mogul, he wooed women online then conned them out of millions of dollars. Now some victims plan for payback.

Name: Baahubali: The Beginning (Hindi Version)
Description: Villagers in the kingdom of Mahismati rescue a baby who is destined to embark on a heroic quest in this Hindi version of S.S. Rajamouli's epic.

Name: Gold Statue
Description: After tracing an artifact to his ancestry, a young man and his friend's search for a gilded statue lands them in a maximum-security prison.

Name: The Old Guard
Description: Four undying warriors who've secretly protected humanity for centuries become targeted for their mysterious powers just as they discover a new immortal.

Name: Nneka The Pretty Serpent
Description: Years after the mysterious murder of her parents, a traumatized woman gains supernatural powers that aid in her quest for revenge against the killers.

Name: 3 Idiots
Description: While attending one of India's premier colleges, three miserable engineering students and best friends struggle to beat the school's draconian system.

Name: Miss Sloane
Description: A tenacious Capitol Hill lobbyist with a well-earned reputation for winning takes on the most challenging battle of her career.

Name: Double World
Description: Keen to bring honor to his clan, young villager Dong Yilong embarks on a perilous journey to compete in a tournament that selects warriors for battle.

Name: Warcraft
Description: Humans and orcs clash when Draenor's warriors arrive at Azeroth through a portal in this fantasy tale based on the popular video game.

Name: Your Excellency
Description: Bumbling through politics, a billionaire businessman's presidential campaign seems destined for disaster until it gets a boost from social media.

Name: Green Snake
Description: While trying to free her sister from Fahai's clutches, Xiao Qing winds up in a dystopian city and meets a mysterious man who can't recall his past life.

Name: Tall Girl 2
Description: Landing the lead in the school musical is a dream come true for Jodi, until the pressure sends her confidence — and her relationship — into a tailspin.

Name: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
Description: Members of an elite security team battle to save the lives of trapped U.S. Consulate personnel under attack by armed terrorists in Benghazi, Libya.

Name: Beast
Description: A jaded former intelligence agent is pulled back into action when an attack at a mall creates a tense hostage situation.

Name: Silverton Siege
Description: After a failed sabotage mission, a trio of anti-apartheid freedom fighters ends up in a tense bank hostage situation. Based on a true story.

Name: Yaksha: Ruthless Operations
Description: On assignment in a perilous city to inspect a Black Ops team and its notorious leader, an upstanding prosecutor steps into a deadly war between spies.

Name: Extraction
Description: A hardened mercenary's mission becomes a soul-searching race to survive when he's sent into Bangladesh to rescue a drug lord's kidnapped son.

Name: Colombiana
Description: After seeing Bogota gangsters murder her parents, Cataleya Restrepo turns herself into a ruthless assassin, dedicated to tracking down their killers.

Name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
Description: John and Jane are an average-on-the-surface couple who don't yet know that they share the same undercover line of work: They're both guns for hire.

Name: 6 Underground
Description: After faking his death, a tech billionaire recruits a team of international operatives for a bold and bloody mission to take down a brutal dictator.

Name: The Old Guard
Description: Four undying warriors who've secretly protected humanity for centuries become targeted for their mysterious powers just as they discover a new immortal.

Name: Salt
Description: Accused of being a Russian spy, CIA agent Evelyn Salt goes on the run, using every tactic she knows to elude her pursuers and clear her name.

Name: The Equalizer 2
Description: Ex-CIA agent-turned-vigilante Robert McCall uses his deadly skills once again to avenge the death of a close friend and former colleague.

Name: Black Crab
Description: To end an apocalyptic war and save her daughter, a reluctant soldier embarks on a desperate mission to cross a frozen sea carrying a top-secret cargo.

Name: The Tourist
Description: An American tourist seeking solace for his shattered heart instead finds it in danger again after encountering a beautiful Interpol agent.

Name: The Italian Job
Description: A clever thief masterminds a major heist amid the waterways of Venice, Italy -- but a betrayal by one of his own spells disaster.
